parameters.definition: Time required to produce a batch of part p on machine m
Cost associated with running machine m
Availability of machine m for production each month
Price obtained from selling a batch of part p
Minimum number of batches of part p that should be produced
Extra cost incurred when running machine m beyond regular operation
Maximum extra hours machine m can be run

description: How many batches of each part should the manufacturer produce each month to maximize profit, considering the following parameters: number of machines (\param{M}), number of parts (\param{P}), time required (\param{TimeRequired}), machine costs (\param{MachineCosts}), machine availability (\param{Availability}), selling prices (\param{Prices}), minimum batches required (\param{MinBatches}), extra costs (\param{ExtraCosts}), and maximum extra hours (\param{MaxExtra})?
